name: The Lair (Mekuri)
description:
The Lair is my submission to Ludum Dare # 33 themed "You are The Monster". In The Lair you are a monster defending your lair from annoying heroes. Kill them, and feast upon them, in order to grow more powerful.

The game is turn based, and may seem a bit hard at first. If you balance your use of corpses (And aren't too unlucky with randomness) things gets easier when you achieve new powers.
